Class Board

public class Board
extends java.lang.Object

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private java.util.List<Building> buildings
    the list of the four different buildings, in order to check how many pieces are available to place to the board
    private static int COLUMN
    constant value that indicates how many columns are present in board
    private Cell[][] matrixBoard
    game board saved as a matrix of Cell class
    private static int ROW
    constant value that indicates how many rows are present in board

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Board()

    void destroyRoofInThisCell​(int row, int column)
    destroy the actual roof, placing the correct roof
    void destroyTowers()
    this method finds in the board if there are some complete towers and replace them with a dome, destroying a tower causes the decreasing of placed quantity of the buildings

    • getNumberOfCompleteTowers

      public int getNumberOfCompleteTowers()
      how much complete towers are placed on the board right now ?
      Returns:
      the number of domes placed on the board

    • destroyTowers

      public void destroyTowers()
      this method finds in the board if there are some complete towers and replace them with a dome, destroying a tower causes the decreasing of placed quantity of the buildings

    • getSymmetrical

      public Cell getSymmetrical​(Cell centralCell, Cell opponentCell)
      this method returns the symmetrical Cell considering the central cell and the opposite cell
      Parameters:
      centralCell - the central cell of the symmetry
      opponentCell - the opposite cell to do the symmetry
      Returns:
      the symmetrical Cell in order of the central Cell input and the opposite cell
